ABOUT US TEAM CONTACT

A true catalyst for change

By shifting the traditional investment paridigm and bringing together the leading team in the space, Cannabis Wheaton is redefining the cannabis industry.

Companies that solely focus on competition will die. Those that focus on value creation will thrive.

We aren’t interested in creating a monopoly. We are interested in creating value for compa-nies and allowing them to exceed their growth potential and achieve success. Cannabis Wheaton invests and support a range of cannabis cultivation companies each of which have different visions, voices and brand values, however they all share a common goal – create a world class industry based on diversity, quality and innovation.

Coast-to-coast network

We are building a coast-to-coast network of partners that will set the stage for the next wave of the canadian cannabis industry.
